item.title: MMEX Cloud Storage Starts from Synology Drive
item.description: As well known that Money Manager EX supports Bring Your Own Cloud well, and this article will take a detailed introduction on getting your MMEX + Synology Drive up on your phones and achieve data sharing. Preparation # Essentially, we need a device with Android 5.1 or newer, and a cloud provider account. here i take Synology Drive as a start Install Synology Drive # Install Synology Drive app on your drive, choose what ever source you like or directly download from Synology Download Center Synology Drive app version: 3.
